name: Dragon of the West
description:
Completed for the Major Production module in the second year at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment (Adelaide), Dragon of the West is a fast-paced twin-stick shooter taking the player across the American Frontier as a samurai avenging the death of his family.

Original Concept: Dan Palamountain
Project Management: Sean Mansell

Art:
Shakur Muller
Joshua McKay

Design:
Dan Palamountain
Morgan Davies
Kristain Gaedt
Sean Mansell

Programming:
Jacob Will
Sean Mansell

Music:
Declan Heath https://soundcloud.com/foreseenforecast
Ignyte https://www.youtube.com/user/DJignyte
Iraci-Music https://soundcloud.com/iracimusic

Concept Art: Katelyn Watt
